column9: Dhanañjaya wrote base, sibling Dhanika wrote Āloka, Bhaṭṭanṛsiṃha wrote Laghuṭīkā; SARIT text contains all three
root text Dvādaśāraṃ Nayacakram by Mallavādin
not Sanskrit, ignore! (avadhi), commentary on Sāhityadarpaṇa
not Sanskrit, ignore! (braj); however, included root Sanskrit text Aparokṣānubhūti/Aparokṣānubhava is ascribed to Śaṃkara
